name: Cuckoo's Life
description:
Help a cuckoo to put its eggs in other birds' nests.

In each level you have to destroy the other bird Eggs and put your eggs in their Nest.

Also you have to eat some little worms. 

Attention to the angry birds, cats and ducks that will try to get you.

To play use the :

Keyboard  :  Right and Left arrows to move , Space for flying , Z for drop eggs

Joystick :  Arrows to move , Y(green) Flying , X(blue) drop eggs

This game was developed for the  Game Jam I Can't Draw But Want To Make A Game (Again) .

All the graphics are made only with 3 shapes : Circles, Triangles and rectangles.

Music and sound : Discord  Ramsey#9423

You can also download the Windows Executable (I recommend it to enjoy best performances). You can use the portable version or install it .
